title: WIN a 3XS Water-Cooled Gaming PC & Set-up worth £7,000+
text: WIN a 3XS Water-Cooled Gaming PC & Set-up worth £7,000+ - Entry method: Gleam - How often you can enter: Unlimited - Ends: 3 weeks from now To celebrate the launch of The 3XS Lucid Fluid water-cooled range, we've teamed up with Corsair and ASUS to give away amazing prizes: 3XS Lucid Fluid water-cooled Gaming PC powered by ASUS NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 32" Corsair Xeneon 4k 144Hz G-Sync Gaming Display Corsair K70 PRO OPX Keyboard Corsair Nightsabre Wireless Mouse Corsair Virtuoso Pro Wired Gaming headphones Simply log in and complete the entries you want for your chance to win. [Box Up To 65% Off January Tech Sale + Extra 5% Code Off Everything!35](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/box-65-january-tech-sale-extra-5-code-off-everything) [NJSJ 2.0 Stereo Gaming PC Speakers£35.99£17.9932](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/njsj-20-stereo-gaming-pc-speakers-amazon) [Stormforce Onyx Gaming PC Intel I3-10100F 8GB 240GB SSD RTX 3050 WiFi Win 11£499.99£382.9920](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/stormforce-onyx-gaming-pc-intel-i3-10100f-8gb-240gb-ssd-rtx-3050-wifi-win-11-ebay) [NZXT White H1 V2 Mini-ITX Windowed PC Gaming Case219.98£219.98£199.9819](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/nzxt-white-h1-v2-mini-itx-windowed-pc-gaming-case21998-scan) [ASUS ROG Strix G13CH I5 16GB 1TB RTX3060 Gaming PC£899£82920](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/asus-rog-strix-g13ch-i5-16gb-1tb-rtx3060-gaming-pc-argos) [SteelSeries Apex Pro HyperMagnetic Gaming Keyboard£199.99£15918](https://www.latestdeals.co.uk/deals/steelseries-apex-pro-hypermagnetic-gaming-keyboard-amazon) Thank you!
